title.jp: Attack! Daybreak Ship!

synopsis: Economy is bad on Mars and Gram has lost his job again today. Then his childhood friend Vess appears before him...

title.jp: Furious Attack! Round Buckler!

synopsis: Gram becomes crew member of the Aurora. But because of his carelessness, the Aurora is attacked by Round Bucklers.

title.jp: Jr. Dream Deployment!

synopsis: Junior takes an RB out without permission and is caught by the Earth Forces. Vess begs Gram to leave the pirate's life.

title.jp: Contact! Gram, Vess and the Submarine

synopsis: The Aurora is being repaired before departure. Gram goes to town to make his farewells but he comes across Vess again!

title.jp: Anna's Struggle! The Fleet of our Dreams

synopsis: The granddaughter of Earth's president Enora has been kidnapped. The Aurora starts to be hunted down for it by error!

title.jp: Ah! Revolution of Glory and Passion!?

synopsis: The crew has to capture the hit-and-run ship that damaged the Aurora. But hidden weapons are found during the chase.

title.jp: Friend or Foe!? The Mercenary Pirate

synopsis: Gram is saved by a man with an artificial arm who claims to be an acquaintance of Elizabeth, the Captain of the Aurora.

title.jp: Gorgeous! Extravagant Ball

synopsis: The Aurora crew boards on a luxury ship of Earth nationality where Martian laws do not apply. Enemies happen to gather.

title.jp: Thump! Swimsuit-riddled Bathhouse

synopsis: The Aurora has to face a giant creature. Gram attempts to fight it with his RB, to prevent the Aurora from sinking.

title.jp: Sightsee! Romance of the First Martian Immigrant

synopsis: Gram helps an old woman but this drags him into an unexpected situation. What's the real purpose of the old woman?

title.jp: Break Through! Federation Trap

synopsis: The Earth Forces have tracked down the Aurora that manages to escape anyway. But Vess finds a way to trace them.

title.jp: Bizarre! The Ghost Ship Drift Zone

synopsis: A ship of unknown origin is detected. Then weird things start to happen in the Aurora. Is this due to a Ghost Pirate?

title.jp: Daring, Fearless! Bride on the Bottom of the Ocean

synopsis: The Aurora saves a woman in a wedding dress, who is after her fiancé. She mistakes one of the crew as her loved one...

title.jp: Big Jailbreak! Beyond Love and Passion

synopsis: Vess deserts the flagship and comes to defy Gram, but she has hard times. Then Gram's RB gets immobilized by chance!

title.jp: The Enemy Under Eyes! Dive Deep, Quietly

synopsis: Vess is still after the Aurora but she is attacked by pirates. Will she be able to get out of this difficult situation?

title.jp: Enter! Hakubutsu Ship, Eichi's Castle!

synopsis: The Aurora seeks for a clue to resolve the mystery of the Box of Guidance. But the job is harder than expected.

title.jp: Rebellion! The Universe's Greatest Pilot!

synopsis: Yagami revolts against Elizabeth on the Box of Guidance and occupies the Aurora. Enora undertakes the Captain's rescue.

title.jp: Marriage proposal to the Captain!? The Man who is called

synopsis: The Aurora crew meets "Doctor", a sworn friend of Captain Elizabeth. There, a ship of the Earth Forces attacks them...

title.jp: Fly, Kibougou! Over that Gate!

synopsis: As Gram tries to break through a strategic point of the Earth Forces, an unknown RB appears that runs alongside him.

title.jp: Duel! Gram and Vess

synopsis: Vess sends a letter of challenge to Gram. When the two face each other, fate makes the duel take an unexpected turn...

title.jp: Good-bye My Friend! A Man's Dream Lasts Forever

synopsis: Junior is appointed as a diver at last, for the new RB. Meanwhile, Yagami decides to go back to his original mission.

title.jp: Discovery! Sanctuary of the Olympus treasure legend

synopsis: Elizabeth makes plans to defeat Earth Forces and Kubernes and enables the Aurora to reach the cavern of the treasure...

title.jp: God`s Stone! Free For All Battle

synopsis: The Aurora makes its way to the cavern thanks to the Daybreak Attack. The owner of the Aurora surprisingly appears.

title.jp: Earth Forces Attack! The Ship of Aurora`s Break-through Tactic

synopsis: At the exit of the cavern, the Earth Forces ambush the Aurora, that has to surrender. But Gram won't accept it.

title.jp: Run, Gram! Rescueing the Captured Comrades

synopsis: Vess and Enora manage to come back to Mars. With Gram, they start the operations to rescue the Aurora crew.

title.jp: The Dawn of Mars! Mars Daybreak

synopsis: The Aurora crew is rescued with the help of Vess, Yagami and a third ally. Captain Elizabeth is burning with anger…
